title: Level 5: Nordic Winter Battery Degradation
description:
You're analyzing EV battery performance in Nordic winter conditions. Given the test data below, calculate the total energy loss percentage.

Battery Test Data:
{{input}}

Format: TestDay, TempC, CapacityKWh, OriginalCapacityKWh
Calculate: ((Sum of losses) / (Sum of original capacities)) * 100
Round to 1 decimal place.
hint: For each test, loss = OriginalCapacity - CurrentCapacity. Sum all losses, sum all original capacities, then calculate the percentage.
